NBA 2K12 - The new part of the famous basketball simulator. More realistic, more colors. With the new management system that you can make impressive and effective feint, dominating the entire site. Dynamic control system plays seriously expands your potential attacker.
And not only at the expense of new movements. Even while in the air, you can easily control the ball and deceive opponents. The fight for the ball now so vivid and real that the player can get hurt and be put out of the game for a while. Playback mode allows for improved online image continuous operation without delay. With the new and improved game engine NBA 2K12 is now as close to reality that you will be fully able to pass the basketball court and feel like a star!
